name: EDM Dance Party
description:
Work your way deep into the coolest club and have a dance battle against the hottest celeb! This game was made by Video Game Development Club for our spring 2018 semester project. 

Move, jump, and later dance using the arrow keys as you avoid falling behind the end of the screen. Obstacles only serve to slow you down and push you back, so try to keep up.

I was the project manager for this game.
